title: Project Construction Milestone Tracking
description: A project manager needs an update on the progress of a solar farm construction project against its planned milestones.

tasks.description: Retrieve the project's original Gantt chart and the latest progress reports from the construction contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the planned schedule and the actual progress data.

tasks.description: Compare the actual completion dates of key milestones (e.g., 'site grading complete', 'racking installed') against the planned dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the racking installation is 2 weeks behind schedule.

tasks.description: Update the project schedule to reflect the delay and forecast a new project completion date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a revised project timeline.
